Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2009 12:02PM - edited Mar 16, 2009 12:03PM by camsdh Hello, I am Ibcspouse, if the mods are consistence, I assume this ID will be banned as Nicki's was..  I know some of Nicki's pain, because just as I was banned, Cam who is stage IV had a recurrence, she had exhausted most Chemo's so now she is going into Phase I clinical trials.  I needed advise...insurance questions, what to expect, moving to Houston and what area of town to look at, what trial to try for.  Phase I experience is very limited, but a few here have gone through this.  I do not post a lot, mostly on IBC board because I research alot and have a good relationship with Doctors and researchers at the IBC Clinic and can find answers that I will pass on.  Cam has chosen a very interesting trial that shows great promise for stopping mets.  I would have enjoyed posting a journal here to help others.  That all being said, I can deal with the decision to ban me, I am not the patient, and have always felt like somewhat of an interloper, seeing the special relationship you ladies have.  But the idea that Nicki, would be excluded from the support and strength that is the basis of this community upsets me greatly.  When the dx of mets knocked Nicki down, some coward here ran out of the crowd to gets their kicks in.  Nicki is a strong Chicago breed woman that will overcome the dx.  She will rise and take care of her patients and give hope to others, but there will always be a small piece of her heart that was taken from her during her time of need. To all that have PM ed me or Nicki or Kelly, please know, you may think that the pm is being sent, but we can not see them, so it is not rudeness that causes us not to respond.  Best wishes and prayers for all, an as T N always proves...God is Able.
Posts.Title: New stage 4 here
